title: Run straight to burning forest skip everything and save gareth

content.text: Run straight to the 1st zone dont need to attack anything

title: Run to keeper camp go straight toward the Fortress Gardens and reach Fortress Walls, you dont need to interact with any npc
talk to the npn in Fortress Walls for side quest and do it then continue with main quest

content.text: Talk to heoborean soldier and do his sidequest in The Store Room

title: Talk to Keeper Guard at Northern Road and watch old man get capture then immediately tp to The Keepers' Camp

content.text: This took awhile so craft time

title: Talk to Keeper Leena then go to the right map then continue with main quest till The Summit

content.text: KIll this when u r in Highlands cause they are rare enemy and drop rare gear

title: Kill boss in The Summit save old man then immediately tp to Keeper' Camp then cotinue main quest till reach Last Refuge Outskirts

content.text: Just use map+right click to tp to Camp after save the old man doesnt need to open gate

title: take side quest in Last Refuge Outskirts, do it and continue main quest till the Council Chamber

content.text: it is faster to go this route

title: Return side+main quest in Coucil Chamber go to the Last Archive
From the Last Archive to to Erza's Library for side quest, grab the book return to the Last Archive
Do main quest till kill the students in Pannion's Study and immediately tp back to the Coucil Chamber
Return the main quest, return side quest in the left dude for gloves or right for the amulet then do main quest till Accient Carvern rift

content.text: Go to next zone dont need to interact with anyone else

title: In Acient Carvern enter Ruined Area timerift continue main quest in the Armory till the End of TIme, the Forge doesnt do anything
pick Mastery go through portal to the Council Chamber
In the Council Chamber, return main quest and go to the gate in the right (dont need to talk to anyone)
Do main till Cultist Camp talk to main quest npc (ignore the rest) then go down south toward next zone kill boss, pick up symbol of hope then tp back to town
When at town immediately head toward top left exit
When at town immediately head toward top left exit
in the Ruins of Welryn skip side quest and head toward bottom left toward Welryn Undercity
Do main quest for the Last Imperial and use map to tp to camp when finish then continue with main
SKIP all side quest from this point (when u enter the Ritual Site) just do main till we reach the Oracles Abode chap 5 (we will comeback later)

content.text: When enter Lotus Hall u can run immediately toward left, ignore quest marker, hug left side of wall until u reach this statue to open a portal
get back to Lotus Hall to insert the stone form here then continue with main quest
Necrotic res in chap 4 is gud, chap 4 start at:
Skip this time rift at the Risen Lake (we comeback later), just do main
Once u done with boat sequence and land at the Shining Cove, u reach chap 5

title: In Oracle Abode turn in side quest to shrine maiden near teleporter and turn in main quest to the snake lady, after this we do side
Tp to The Shattered Valley in Ruined Era and head north toward the Abandon Tunnel then the Lost Refuge and do the side quest by find the tome and take it
Tp back to the Shattered Valley and go south toward the time rift lead to Acient Forest
Kill dragon boss in the Acient Forest
TP to the Council Chamber in the Ruined Era to turn 2 side quest in
Tp to the Risen Lake in the Imperial Era head toward the Corrupted Lake time rift up north
Kill boss in the Corrupted Lake
Return to the Shinning Cove in the Imperial Era and unlock Temporal Sanctum while grabbing the saphire tablet for side quest
Do mono till u find Temporal Sanctum key

content.text: You should be 13/15 passive and 5/8 idols

title: Do the dungeon and reach chap 9 in Radiant Dune
In Radiant Dune do main quest, and find the vault (side area) for a sidequest, it isnâ€™t marked on the map.

content.text: One possible spawn location for vault:

title: Clear the vault and pick up the treasure, exit the way you came and continue main till majelka upper district

content.text: When reach Majelka Upper District, run back to Radiant Dunes then TP to Majelka Upper District with map so you dont have to walk the long walkway

title: Talk to side quest NPC, the main quest npc then go to majelka lower district
Do side quest in the lower district then do main till the Slums

content.text: Do not give this guy bride, just stick to top option:

title: Skip the first quest marker in the slums, go north east and turn in the desert treasure side quest, then go to the next quest marker and kill the scalebane guild leader
TP to Majelka Upper District, turn in the quests, and then go north west pick factions and head to the Oasis

content.text: Turn in side quest and accpet main:
Pick faction (clearly MG to the right):

title: Run southwest in the oasis towards the marker on your map to unlock side quest, then run north and kill the spinehunter alpha.
Continue East to get to the crystal mines entrance talk to the npc near entrancce of the mines
Once youâ€™re in the crystal mines go northwest and kill the crystal lotus for side quest, then run east to continue main
Finish chapter 9 and get ur +1 to all atributes
TP back to the Oasis and turn in the quest, and you should get all skill points and idol slots
(optional) TP back to majelka upper district and turn in the quest.
